ItemDesc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
ItemBGDesc: Pom-Pom clandestinely passed on to you the recipe for "Pom-Pom's Fried Fowl," with the secret marinade's ingredients inscribed on it. Pom-Pom warned you repeatedly to keep possession of this formula strictly confidential.\n\n"People will stop at nothing to get their hands on this recipe," Pom-Pom cautioned.
